name: Threat Intel Quick Analysis - Optimized
description: The Sumo Logic Threat Intel Quick Analysis App helps you identify security threats by correlating daily updated threat definitions from CrowdStrike against your log data using the threat lookup service. This App provides pre built dashboards and queries to analyze threats in your environment for malicious IP, File Name, Hash 256, Domain, URL and Email.

children.name: High Malicious IP Threats with SSHScanner Labels filtered out - Optimized
Threat Intel Quick Analysis - Domain - Optimized

panels.name: Kill Chains
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| where !isEmpty(kill_chains)
| sum(_count) by kill_chains

panels.name: Threats by Malicious Confidence
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats by malicious_confidence
| sort threats

panels.name: Domain Threats
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| timeslice 1m
| sum(_count) by _timeslice

panels.name: Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats

panels.name: Threats by Source Category
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats by _sourceCategory
| sort threats

panels.name: Threat Table
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats by domain, malicious_confidence, Actor,_source, _sourceCategory 
| sort threats

panels.name: Threats by Source
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats by _source
| sort threats

panels.name: Threats by Actor
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats by actor
| sort threats

panels.name: Top Domains
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threats by domain 
| sort threats
| limit 50

panels.name: Threats by Source

| sum(_count) as threats by _source
| sort threats

| timeslice 1m
| sum(_count) by _timeslice

panels.name: Threats by Actor
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_email
| sum(_count) as threats by actor
| sort threats

panels.name: Threats by Malicious Confidence
panels.queryString:

| sort threats

panels.name: Top Emails
panels.queryString:

panels.name: Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_email
| sum(_count) as threats

panels.name: Threat Table
panels.queryString:

| sum(_count) as threats by email_address, malicious_confidence, Actor,_source, _sourceCategory
| sort threats

children.name: Threat Intel Quick Analysis - IP - Optimized

panels.name: Threats by Malicious Confidence
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats by malicious_confidence
| sort threats

panels.name: Threats by Location
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, city from geo://location on ip = ip_address
| sum(_count) as _count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, city
| where !(isNull(latitude))
| if(latitude==-90, -70, latitude) as latitude
| sort _count

panels.name: IP Threats
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| timeslice 15m
| sum(_count) by _timeslice

panels.name: Threats by Source
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats by _source
| sort threats

panels.name: Default malicious_confidence filter set to high
Threats by Source Category
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats by _sourceCategory
| sort threats

panels.name: Kill Chains
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| where !isEmpty(kill_chains)
| sum(_count) as threats by kill_chains
| sort threats

panels.name: Threat Types
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| if(isBlank(ip_address_types), "unknown", ip_address_types) as ip_address_types
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address_types
| sort threats

panels.name: Threats by Actor
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats by actor
| sort threats

panels.name: Top IPs
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address
| sort threats
| limit 50

panels.name: Threat Table
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats by ip_address, malicious_confidence, Actor,_source, _sourceCategory
| sort threats

panels.name: Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threats

children.name: Threat Intel Quick Analysis - Optimized - Threat Lookup
children.description: This is a parametrized search to lookup the raw details about a threat.
children.searchQuery:
*
| Limit 1
| "{{Threat}}" as threat
| lookup raw, type, actor, threatlevel from sumo://threat/cs on threat=threat
| fields -_raw

queryParameters.name: Threat
queryParameters.label: Threat
queryParameters.description: Enter an IOC to retrieve the raw details on the threat.

children.name: Threat Intel Quick Analysis - Overview - Optimized

panels.name: Threats Over Time
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address or _view=threat_intel_url or _view=threat_intel_domain or _view=threat_intel_email
| timeslice 1m
|sum(_count) as threat_count by _timeslice
| fillmissing timeslice(1m)

panels.name: Number of Log Lines (Events) Scanned for Threats
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*
| count

panels.name: URL Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_url
| sum(_count) as threat_count

panels.name: Domain Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_domain
| sum(_count) as threat_count

panels.name: Threats Overall
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address or _view=threat_intel_url or _view=threat_intel_domain or _view=threat_intel_email
|sum(_count) as threat_count

panels.name: Threat by Malicious Confidence
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address or _view=threat_intel_url or _view=threat_intel_domain or _view=threat_intel_email
| sum(_count) as threat_count by malicious_confidence

panels.name: Default malicious_confidence filter set to high
Email Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_email
| sum(_count) as threat_count

panels.name: IP Threat Count
panels.queryString:
_view=threat_intel_ip_address
| sum(_count) as threat_count
